sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"看起来，好像是"之意。
means: appear ：指从感观印象看似乎是如此，但有时着重指因视野、观点限制而产生的歪曲印象。
look ：指从样子看起来，侧重通过视觉而建立的印象。
seem ：多指从主观印象或个反应得出的看法。

stems_affixes.word_buile: seeming表面上的+ly表副词→adv.表面上地
seem相类似,一样→v.象是, 似乎

sentences.en: He certainly didn't seem to be a fool.
sentences.cn: 他当然不像是个傻瓜。

sentences.en: She seems a clever girl.
sentences.cn: 她好像是个聪明的姑娘。

sentences.en: The baby seems to be asleep.
sentences.cn: 那婴孩好像是睡着了。

sentences.en: He seemed disappointed when the man refused his request.
sentences.cn: 当那个人拒绝了他的要求时他看起来很失望。

sentences.en: He seems to think so.
sentences.cn: 他似乎认为如此。

sentences.en: The main streets seemed shining in the sun.
sentences.cn: 在阳光照射下, 大街似乎闪闪发光。

sentences.en: It seems that you are lying.
sentences.cn: 看来你在撒谎。

sentences.en: It seems to me that Peter has seen nothing of life.
sentences.cn: 在我看来, 彼得还不懂人情世故。

sentences.en: It seems as if you are the first one here.
sentences.cn: 看起来你是第一个来这儿的。

sentences.en: It seemed a pity to refuse.
sentences.cn: 拒绝似乎是可惜的。

sentences.en: There seems no need to go now.
sentences.cn: 好像没有必要现在就去。

sentences.en: There seems to be a misunderstanding between us.
sentences.cn: 我们之间好像有些误解。

means.word_mean: （缓和语气）感到好像，觉得似乎
（表示不确切或客气）看来好像，似乎 </seg>

data.mean: （表示不确切或客气）看来好像，似乎
（用以缓和语气）感到好像，觉得似乎

fixed_phrase_list.cn: 似乎，好像，从句用虚拟语气

sentence.cn: 我曾告诉孩子们，虽然动词可能看起来很枯燥，但他们一生中所做的大多数聪明的事情都将是动词。
sentence.en: I had advised the kids that while verbs may seem dull, most of the clever things they do throughout their lives will be verbs.
sentence.from: 2017年高考英语全国卷2 完形填空 原文

sentence.cn: 我们从第二段得知，婴儿似乎和科学家一样收集证据。
sentence.en: We learn from paragraph 2 that babies seem to collect evidence just as scientists do.
sentence.from: 2016年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 阅读C 题设

mean.mean: （用以缓和语气）感到好像，觉得似乎

entry.def: You use seem to say that someone or something gives the impression of having a particular quality, or of happening in the way you describe.

example.ex: We heard a series of explosions. They seemed quite close by...
example.tran: 我们听到一连串的爆炸声，似乎就在附近。
除了我们，大家好像都很忙碌。

entry.def: You use seem when you are describing your own feelings or thoughts, or describing something that has happened to you, in order to make your statement less forceful.
entry.tran: (在描述自己的感觉、想法、经历时用于缓和语气)好像，似乎

example.ex: I seem to have lost all my self-confidence...
I seem to remember giving you very precise instructions...
example.tran: 我好像记得给过你非常明确的指示。

entry.def: If you say that you cannot seem or could not seem to do something, you mean that you have tried to do it and were unable to.

example.ex: No matter how hard I try I cannot seem to catch up on all the bills...
example.tran: 无论怎么努力，我好像就是无法付清所有的账单。

example.ex: Kim's mother couldn't seem to stop crying.
example.tran: 金的母亲似乎要哭个没完。

means.word_mean: 1. give a certain impression or have a certain outward aspect;

sentences.sentence: "This appears to be a very difficult problem"
"They appeared like people who had not eaten or slept for a long time"

means.word_mean: 2. seem to be true, probable, or apparent;

sentences.sentence: "It seems that he is very gifted"
"It appears that the weather in California is very bad"
"There seems no reason to go ahead with the project now"

means.word_mean: 4. appear to one's own mind or opinion;

sentences.sentence: "I seem to be misunderstood by everyone"
"I can't seem to learn these Chinese characters"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (also in the sense 'suit, befit, be appropriate'): from Old Norse sæma 'to honour', from sæmr 'fitting'

sentences.cn: 你好像挺高兴。
sentences.en: You seem happy.

sentences.cn: 你觉得什么最好，就做什么。
sentences.en: Do whatever seems best to you.

sentences.cn: 他看来是个好人。
sentences.en: He seems a nice man.

sentences.cn: 当时这主意好像不错。
sentences.en: It seemed like a good idea at the time.

sentences.cn: “这么说，他要去那儿了？”“似乎是这样。”
sentences.en: ‘He'll be there, then? ’ ‘ So it seems (= people say so) . ’

sentences.cn: 他们一直仿佛是要结婚似的。
sentences.en: It always seemed as though they would get married.

sentences.cn: 看来，他们知道自己在干什么。
sentences.en: It seems that they know what they're doing.

sentences.cn: 看来，他们知道自己在干什么。
sentences.en: They seem to know what they're doing.

sentences.cn: 我大概是把书忘在家里了。
sentences.en: I seem to have left my book at home.

sentences.cn: 我怕是没法在今天开始了。
sentences.en: I can't seem to (= I've tried, but I can't) get started today.

sentences.cn: 我们大家似乎都同意。
sentences.en: It would seem that we all agree.

sentences.cn: 要学生买一本词典，好像也没什么不合情理。
sentences.en: It seems only reasonable to ask students to buy a dictionary.

sentences.cn: 我们听到一连串的爆炸声，似乎就在附近。
sentences.en: We heard a series of explosions. They seemed quite close by...

sentences.cn: 除了我们，大家好像都很忙碌。
sentences.en: Everyone seems busy except us...

sentences.cn: 我好像已经自信全无。
sentences.en: I seem to have lost all my self-confidence...

sentences.cn: 我好像记得给过你非常明确的指示。
sentences.en: I seem to remember giving you very precise instructions...

sentences.cn: 无论怎么努力，我好像就是无法付清所有的账单。
sentences.en: No matter how hard I try I cannot seem to catch up on all the bills...

sentences.cn: 金的母亲似乎要哭个没完。
sentences.en: Kim's mother couldn't seem to stop crying.

sentences.cn: 他因为打得太冒险而输掉了这场比赛.
sentences.en: He lost the game by playing too riskily.

sentences.cn: 看来你连自己的朋友都信不过了.
sentences.en: You seem mistrustful even of your friends.

sentences.cn: 加利福尼亚的一些地区对我来说就像天堂一样.
sentences.en: Parts of California seem like paradise to me.

sentences.cn: 真遗憾, 我今天竞技状态不好; 咱们明天再来一场.
sentences.en: I'm sorry. I seem to be off my game today; let's play again tomorrow.

sentences.cn: 他似乎不太合乎我们的要求.
sentences.en: He doesn't seem equal to meeting our demands.

sentences.cn: 他对这个题目似乎一点也不感兴趣.
sentences.en: He did not seem at all interested in the subject.

sentences.cn: 她的心情似乎很平静.
sentences.en: Her feelings seem very contained.

sentences.cn: 有些人似乎从来都是幸运的.
sentences.en: Some people seem to be always lucky.

sentences.cn: 敌人即使像老鼠, 也要当作狮子防.
sentences.en: Though thy enemy seem a mouse, yet watch him like a lion.

sentences.cn: 你似乎没有意识到你现在的处境有多危险.
sentences.en: You don't seem to realize what thin ice you are on.

sentences.cn: 他当然不像是个傻瓜.
sentences.en: He certainly didn't seem to be a fool.

sentences.cn: 你好像挺高兴。
sentences.en: You seem happy.

sentences.cn: 当时这主意好像不错。
sentences.en: It seemed like a good idea at the time.

sentences.cn: 要学生买一本词典，好像也没什么不合情理。
sentences.en: It seems only reasonable to ask students to buy a dictionary.

sentences.cn: 除了我们，大家好像都很忙碌。
sentences.en: Everyone seems busy except us...

sentences.cn: 我好像已经自信全无。
sentences.en: I seem to have lost all my self-confidence...

sentences.cn: 我好像记得给过你非常明确的指示。
sentences.en: I seem to remember giving you very precise instructions...

sentences.cn: 无论怎么努力，我好像就是无法付清所有的账单。
sentences.en: No matter how hard I try I cannot seem to catch up on all the bills...

sentences.cn: 乍看之下，这好像是一种优势，它赋予了人们在不受外界因素影响的情况下做出公正判断的能力。
sentences.en: At first glance this might seem like a strength that grants the ability to make judgments which are unbiased by external factors.

sentences.cn: 男：我试过，但他好像就是没时间跟我谈。
sentences.en: M:  I’ve  tried,  but  it  seems  like he just has no time for me.
sentences.from: 16年6月四级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 路上人们好像挤作了一团.
sentences.en: In the road the people seemed heaped together.

sentences.cn: 校址好像太偏僻些, 可是不失为一个机会.
sentences.en: The school seems a little remote, but it's still a good opportunity.

sentences.cn: 这种药到目前为止好像耐受性还很不错.
sentences.en: So far, the drug seems to have been well tolerated.
sentences.from: 英汉非文学 - 生命科学 - 回顾与展望

sentences.cn: 附近好像没人, 于是我就进去了.
sentences.en: Nobody seemed about, so I went in.

sentences.cn: 秘书对她该做什么好像很有把握.
sentences.en: The secretary seems quite clear about what to do.

sentences.cn: 他那天好像百事不如意似的.
sentences.en: That day he seemed to be badly hung up about things.

sentences.cn: 那些快乐 、 狂热的观众在第一幕里好像都没有看见她.
sentences.en: The happy, sweltering audience did not seem to see her in the first act.
sentences.from: 英汉文学 - 嘉莉妹妹

sentences.cn: 他们发现,全世界的人在生活中好像都有一个共同的感情图案.
sentences.en: They found that people around the world seem to share an emotional design in life.

sentences.cn: 几个人摇了摇头,意识到救援“两房”好像已经是很久以前的事了.
sentences.en: Several staffers shook as they realized how far away the Fannie and Freddie rescue seemed.

sentences.cn: 但这似乎并没有让斯内普感到局促不安, 他好像觉得这挺好笑的.
sentences.en: This did not seem to discompose him ; on the contrary, he looked rather amused.

sentences.cn: 时装模特在我们学校好像多得很.
sentences.en: Fashion models in our school seem to be two a penny now.

sentences.cn: 他好像对过去的事情有选择地回忆.
sentences.en: He seemed to have a very selective recall of past events.

sentences.cn: 皮特好像设了狡猾的圈套要陷害你.
sentences.en: Peter seems to have set a cunning trap for you.

sentences.cn: 好像一夜之间, 昆曲又走进了大众的视野,引起社会的关注.
sentences.en: Kunqu seems to have come back into public notice overnight, spurring extensive interest.

sentences.cn: 彼得: 大夫,我觉得不舒服, 好像浑身都在疼.
sentences.en: Peter: I'm not feeling well, Doctor. I seem to have pain all over.

sentences.cn: 他好像无法理解你.
sentences.en: He seems unable to understand you.

sentences.cn: 空调器好像出毛病了.
sentences.en: The air conditioner seems to be out of order.
sentences.from: 疯狂英语流畅美语旅游口语专训

sentences.cn: 在这对年轻夫妇之间好像发生过一场争吵.
sentences.en: There seems to be a quarrel between the young couple.

sentences.cn: 他好像是朝物美商城的方向走的.
sentences.en: He seemed to walk in the direction of Wu Mart.

sentences.cn: 他学识渊博, 但好像没有创作力.
sentences.en: With all his scholarship, he seems unable to produce.

sentences.cn: 他们一直仿佛是要结婚似的。
sentences.en: It always seemed as though they would get married.

sentences.cn: 他的眼睛仿佛在紫色的暮光中闪烁.
sentences.en: His eyes seemed to shine in the purplish twilight.

sentences.cn: (当时)最令我胆战心惊的东西原来只不过是仿佛死蛇一样的东西.
sentences.en: What surprised me most was actually just what seemed to be a dead snake.

sentences.cn: 那已经是很久以前的事情了,但在眼前的照片却仿佛是昨天.
sentences.en: That was a long time ago but seems to be yesterday.

sentences.cn: 店堂里相当闷热, 空气仿佛被棺木的味儿污染了.
sentences.en: The shop was close and hot, and the atmosphere seemed tainted with the smell of coffins.

sentences.cn: 这个新辟的污秽城市仿佛天然自成一幅幅动人的优美图画.
sentences.en: This raw, dirty town seemed naturally to compose itself into stirring artistic pictures.

sentences.cn: 他仿佛马上又镇定了,压下了这场风波.
sentences.en: He seemed to recollect himself presently, and smothered the storm.

sentences.cn: 她的身体,仿佛把青春与活力灌注到他的身上.
sentences.en: Her body seemed to be pouring some of its youth and vigour into his.

sentences.cn: 路仿佛没有尽头, 街道就象触足伸开的蜘蛛编织成的黑网.
sentences.en: The way seemed interminable, and the streets like the black web of some sprawling spider.

sentences.cn: 怪得很, 这报时的钟声仿佛让他抖擞了精神.
sentences.en: Curiously, the chiming of the hour seemed to have put new heart into him.

sentences.cn: 过了一会儿,她平静下来,而且,那神情看上去就仿佛是在听他说话.
sentences.en: After a few moments she became calm and seemed to listen to him.

sentences.cn: 在五月天里, 闷热的正午仿佛无尽地悠长.
sentences.en: It was in May. The sultry noon seemed endlessly long.

sentences.cn: 这个权威人士仿佛知道怎么处理问题.
sentences.en: The heavy artillery seemed to know how to handle matters.

sentences.cn: 他仿佛忽然浑身是劲.
sentences.en: He seemed suddenly filled with energy.

sentences.cn: 仿佛一个吻已封缄了你的嘴.
sentences.en: And ie seems that a kiss had sealed your mouth.

sentences.cn: 对现实世界来说,那些旧上海的防空洞仿佛是另一个平行世界的所在.
sentences.en: The secret world of the old Shanghai bomb shelter seems to exist in a parallel universe.

sentences.cn: 狂风仿佛要把船撕成碎片似的.
sentences.en: The ferocious winds seemed about to tear the ship to pieces.

sentences.cn: 关于动作的描写没人可以超过他,梅尔维尔的功力仿佛在这里找到了适当的体现.
sentences.en: The actionwriting is unsurpassable ; for once Melville's energy seems suited to the job in hand.

sentences.cn: 问题仿佛很复杂.
sentences.en: The problem seems very complicated.

sentences.cn: 阳光照在身上,仿佛更加温暖, 他俩全有了睡意.
sentences.en: The sun seemed to have grown hotter. They were both sleepy.

sentences.cn: 书本仿佛从四面八方向他压了过来,要压垮地.
sentences.en: From every side the books seemed to press upon him and crush him.

sentences.cn: 仿佛看到一个在海岸边伫立凝望的女子.
sentences.en: Seemed at the seashore stood at the woman.

sentences.cn: 在夏威夷的落日下,天空仿佛烧着了火.
sentences.en: The sky seemed to flame in the Hawaiian sunset.

sentences.cn: 他仿佛就要在我们眼前倒下似的.
sentences.en: He seemed to crumple up in front of us.

sentences.cn: 她仿佛有使不完的劲.
sentences.en: She seems to have inexhaustible energy.

sentences.cn: 它的书页上仿佛散发出浓烈的香气,叫人头晕.
sentences.en: The heavy odour of incense seemed to cling about its pages and to trouble the brain.

sentences.cn: 英格兰潮湿的空气仿佛加深了她双颊的红润.
sentences.en: The moist English air seemed to have deepened the bloom of her cheeks.

sentences.cn: 那个影子仿佛脱下了他的帽子,随即一个平静的声音从黑暗里发出来.
sentences.en: The shadow seemed to take off a hat and a quiet voice came from the darkness.

sentences.cn: 那条白色的大路本身就往前伸展,越远越高,越远越细,最后仿佛和天空相连.
sentences.en: The white road seemed to ascend and diminish till it joined the sky.

sentences.cn: 我仿佛看见桃树长出了红色的花蕾, 柳树披上了神秘的面纱.
sentences.en: I seem to see a red flower buds grow peach trees, willow covered with mystery.

sentences.cn: “这么说，他要去那儿了？”“似乎是这样。”
sentences.en: ‘He'll be there, then? ’ ‘ So it seems (= people say so) . ’

sentences.cn: 我们大家似乎都同意。
sentences.en: It would seem that we all agree.

sentences.cn: 我们听到一连串的爆炸声，似乎就在附近。
sentences.en: We heard a series of explosions. They seemed quite close by...

sentences.cn: 金的母亲似乎要哭个没完。
sentences.en: Kim's mother couldn't seem to stop crying.

sentences.cn: 然而，随着青春期的结束，大脑关闭了其中一半的能力，只留下在生命前十年中似乎最有价值的思维方式。
sentences.en: At the end of adolescence, however, the brain shuts down half of that capacity, preserving only those modes of thought that have seemed most valuable during the first decade or so of life.

sentences.cn: 女工们意识到，自己已经成为了试验对象，而仅凭这一意识，似乎就足以改变她们的行为。
sentences.en: An awareness that they were being experimented upon seemed to be enough to alter workers' behavior by itself.

sentences.cn: 前景似乎很是渺茫。
sentences.en: The prospect seems remote

sentences.cn: 这一理论似乎也解释了，为什么某些样式、品牌或者社区会突然受到始料未及的欢迎。
sentences.en: The theory also seems to explain the sudden and unexpected popularity of certain looks, brands, or neighborhoods.

sentences.cn: 事实上，他们似乎根本不是所必需的。
sentences.en: In fact,they don't seem to be required of all.

sentences.cn: 但不幸的是，银行的游说现在似乎已然奏效。
sentences.en: Unfortunately, banks' lobbying now seems to be working.

sentences.cn: 对于一直都是由像古斯塔夫·马勒和皮埃尔·布列兹这样的音乐家来指挥的乐团而言，这样描述乐团的下一任指挥，至少对《纽约时代》的一些读者来说，似乎是一种牵强的赞美。
sentences.en: As a description of the next music director of an orchestra that has hitherto been led by musicians like Gustav Mahler and Pierre Boulez, that seems likely to have struck at least some Times readers as faint praise.

sentences.cn: 这一想法似乎是有望成功的，罗森伯格也确实是位敏锐的观察家。
sentences.en: The idea seems promising，and Rosenberg is a perceptive observer.

sentences.cn: 研究中的一个卓越发现是，相似的基因似乎比其他基因进化得更快。
sentences.en: One of the remarkable findings of the study was that the similar genes seem to be evolving faster than other genes.

sentences.cn: 千禧一代似乎面临这样的矛盾：他们虽然很少肴正装，但却最关注时尚和个人品牌。
sentences.en: Millennials, it seems, face the paradox of being the least formal generation yet the most conscious of style and personal branding.

sentences.cn: 似乎很明显，这样的一项计划将促进一种终将强制实行网络“驾照”的心态。
sentences.en: It seems clear that such a scheme is an initiative push toward what would eventually be a compulsory Internet “driver's license”mentality.

sentences.cn: 一年前，报业衰亡似乎已近在咫尺。
sentences.en: A year ago the end seemed near.

sentences.cn: 我们周围的每个人似乎都同意这一说法,这从他们紧抓手机不放就可以看出来,即使是在地铁上没有信号的时候。
sentences.en: Everyone around us seems to agree by the way they cling to their phones, even without a signal  on a subway.

sentences.cn: 公司似乎会在大多数人相对幸福的地方投资更多，而非人们的幸福感不均衡的地方
sentences.en: Firms seem to invest more in places where most people are relatively happy, rather than in places with happiness inequality.

sentences.cn: 的确如此,如今的无工作者似乎过得并不快乐。
sentences.en: Indeed, today unemployed don' t seem to be having a great time.

sentences.cn: 维珍银河公司的定期太空航班在本周出事前似乎已近乎开始。
sentences.en: Virgin Galactic had, prior to this week ’ s accident, seemed closest to starting regular flights.
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 根据女士的说法，什么似乎是非常成功的？。
sentences.en: What seems to have been very successful according to the woman speaker?.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: Burke 说，基于随机调查，即研究人员的参比标准来看，那确实似乎有帮助。
sentences.en: And Burke says that actually does seem to help, based on randomized studies—the researchers’ gold standard.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 根据James Burke 的观点，什么似乎有助于减少认知能力下降？。
sentences.en: According to James Burke, what does seem to help reduce cognitive decline?.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 从收集到的数据看，总体来说，导致我们失去大部分睡眠时间的似乎是体育赛事、时制更改和节假日。
sentences.en: From data collected, it seems the things that cause us to lose the most sleep, on average, are sporting events, time changes, and holidays.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 所以，当孩子们跑来跑去时，他们似乎只是在锻炼身体，其实，他们可能也在锻炼大脑。
sentences.en: So while it may seem as if kids are just exercising their bodies when they’re running around, they may actually be exercising their brains as well.
sentences.from: 16年6月四级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 其他系统似乎也在防干扰这方面相当自信。
sentences.en: Other systems also seem confident on the subject of jamming.
sentences.from: 16年12月四级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 尽管他的记忆力一向不错，但是年少爱情带来的兴奋感似乎改变了他的大脑：自此，他开始记住生活的每个细节。
sentences.en: He had always had a good memory, but the thrill of young love seems to have shifted a gear in his mind: from now on, he would start recording his whole life in detail.
sentences.from: 17年6月四级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 事实上，我们似乎一直都在外面玩！我不太记得工作的事儿——当然，我那时还是个学生——也不记得自己经常在家待着。
sentences.en: In fact, we seemed to be out all the time! I don’t really remember working—  of course, I was a student—or sitting around at home very much.
sentences.from: 17年6月四级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 我得去参加好多会议，而且似乎在花很多时间做不必要的文书工作。
sentences.en: I’m  expected  to  attend too  many  meetings  and  I seem  to  be  spending  a  lot  of my  time  doing  unnecessary paperwork.
sentences.from: 16年6月四级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 几个星期过去了,Jason似乎已经安顿好.
sentences.en: A few weeks have passed and Jason seems to have settled in well.

sentences.cn: 他悄悄地溜了过去, 竭力装作漫不经心的样子.
sentences.en: He sidled past, trying to seem casual.

sentences.cn: 他看来好像生过一场病.
sentences.en: He seems to have been sick.

sentences.cn: 三年级到五年级现在看来好像过得很快.
sentences.en: Grade 3,4 and 5 seemed to be so fast to pass now.

sentences.cn: 在告诉她邀请她去时,她看来好像没多大热情.
sentences.en: She seemed lacking in enthusiasm when she was told of the invitation.

sentences.cn: 在你看来好像我有什么不同似的.
sentences.en: You seem to think that things are different for me.

sentences.cn: 我们谈论那部电影时.她看来好像没多大热情.
sentences.en: She seemed lacking in enthusiasm when we were talking about that film.

sentences.cn: 他们看来好像活得很好.
sentences.en: They seem to live a good life.

sentences.cn: 他看来好像已不再能应付了.
sentences.en: He does not seem able to cope any more.

sentences.cn: 看来好像有个错误.
sentences.en: There seems to be some mistake.

sentences.cn: 而改变, 通常而言是你们人类看来好像非常害怕的东西.
sentences.en: And change is something that you humans seem to be very afraid of, generally speaking.

sentences.cn: 我们品题辩论那部电影时,她看来好像没多大热情.
sentences.en: She seemed lacking in enthusiasm when we talking about that film.

sentences.cn: 这样看来,好像大多数喜欢吃巧克力的人都是女的.
sentences.en: I don't know why chocolate seems to be more popular among girls.
